name: Case X
description:
<<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>> Warning
(First build uploaded has some broken music and a broken ending.)
(Fix will be coming soon.)

A young woman.
Found dead this morning by her neighbour. 

Another day, another case.
Usually, they are easy to solve.
But this time, your gifts could lose you...

Will you be able to understand what happened to her?

<<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>><<>> TW

Disturbing sound and images
Mention of physical abuse & self-destructive thoughts

~ Game made during the Jamming Assembly 2020 ~
